zombieHit

protected void zombieHit(int damage,
                         java.lang.String filename,
                         int timeLoop,
                         int points)
This method is called whenever a zombie is hit by an object of the bullet class. It takes four inputs: 1. the damage caused by the bullet, which is reduced from its health, 2. the filename where the animation for its removal is stored, 3. the time of a loop of the gif, and 4. the points for killing the zombie
